reactTrigger.expression:
const SourceRecordType = GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent()));

SourceRecordType != GetReactionTypeId() && SourceRecordType != GetEffectTypeId() &&
GetStatModValue(GetHitEvent(), $#10516612381411111:108986352686712$) < 0.0 &&
(HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Combostep.End") ||
HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Archetype.Ranger.Ammo"))
